titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Nunaka Valley Little League junior girls softball team on their performance in the Junior League Softball World Series.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/23/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the athletes, parents, and coaching staff of the Nunaka Valley Little League junior girls softball team on an impressive 2011 season.
